thread.title: U.S. envoy says he urged North Korea to release Americans before summit | North Korean Insight

title: U.S. envoy says he urged North Korea to release Americans before summit | North Korean Insight
text:
U.S. envoy says he urged North Korea to release Americans before summit March 15, 2018 | Reuters | Shares: 0 
WASHINGTON (Reuters) – The State Department’s recently retired envoy for North Korea said on Thursday he has urged North Korea to send a positive signal by releasing three American prisoners before a possible summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.
